definition: A numerical term denoting a very large quantity, typically used to describe a specific numerical value. It is commonly employed in contexts related to finance, statistics, population, and measurements.

examples.german: Eine Million Menschen leben in der Stadt.
examples.english: One million people live in the city.

examples.german: Er hat eine Million Euro gewonnen.
Die Firma hat einen Umsatz von mehreren Millionen Euro.
examples.english: The company has a turnover of several million euros.

examples.german: Die Bevölkerungszahl beträgt über eine Million.
examples.english: The population is over one million.
